model.name: Additional Component Versions - Latest State as 0.3.0.2 with Requirement 0.1.2.2, User, Unit
model.description: Add latest state of all other components as 0.3.0.2 versions, especially Web4Requirement 0.1.2.2 as 0.3.0.2, plus User and Unit components to complete the ecosystem restoration.
model.rationale: Complete ecosystem restoration requires all supporting components (Web4Requirement, User, Unit, Scenario, ChangeRequest) in consistent 0.3.0.2 versions for unified development environment.
acceptance_criteria: Create scripts/versions links for all new 0.3.0.2 components
Ensure complete ecosystem consistency with 0.3.0.2 versions

technical_details.ecosystem_completion: All supporting components in consistent versions

model.implementation_notes: This completes the ecosystem restoration with all supporting components in consistent 0.3.0.2 versions, providing a unified development environment.
